definition: knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]

sentences.english: Conclusions The non-natives are the major component of TB patients in Shenzhen.
sentences.chinese: 结论外来人口是深圳市结核病疫情的主要组成部分。

sentences.english: China is fully implementing the policies to control modern tuberculosis.
sentences.chinese: 中国全面推行现代结核病控制策略。

sentences.english: Objective To learn the situation of supervision and management of pulmonary tuberculosis(TB) patients by village doctors and its influential factors.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解村医生督导管理肺结核病人现状及影响因素。

sentences.english: City of CDC TB Division Chen Xiubing doctor said.
sentences.chinese: 市疾控中心结核病防治科陈秀兵医师说。

sentences.english: That means not only saving the people with MDR-TB but also the general population.
sentences.chinese: 这不仅意味着拯救耐多药结核病人，也拯救所有的人。

sentences.english: Objective To test the efficacy of rifapention on treating patients with pulmonary tuberculosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的验证利福喷丁治疗肺结核病的疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the treatment effects of smear-positive cases with pulmonary tuberculosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析涂阳肺结核病人的化疗效果。

sentences.english: My wife and I have a friend who is a nurse in a tuberculosis hospital.
sentences.chinese: 我和妻子有一位护士朋友，在结核病医院工作。

sentences.english: South Africa is ranked fifth on the list of 22 high-burden TB countries in the world.
sentences.chinese: 南非在全世界22个结核病高负担国家中排在第5位。

sentences.english: The standard vaccination against tuberculosis is the BCG.
sentences.chinese: 标准的结核病疫苗是卡介苗。

sentences.english: Tuberculosis is becoming the commonest AIDS-defining illness.
sentences.chinese: 结核病成为最常见的爱滋病界定疾病。

sentences.english: Attention should be paid to drug resistance and dependence in the discharge medication of tuberculosis patients.
sentences.chinese: 对结核病患者出院带药应该注意耐药性和患者依从性。

sentences.english: But the idea of tackling MDR-TB head-on has been a more recent development.
sentences.chinese: 但迎面对付耐多药结核病是最近的的新想法。

sentences.english: TB still needs better visibility and attention.
sentences.chinese: 结核病仍需要更高的可见度和更多关注。

sentences.english: The delayed rate of newly registered smear positive patients was over 64%.
sentences.chinese: 新登涂阳肺结核病人延误为64%以上。

sentences.english: I will focus on challenges, and consequences, that go beyond national TB programmes.
sentences.chinese: 我将着重说明超出国家结核病规划范围的挑战与后果。
